Section.Catchline: Division of Treasury to turn over to the Division of Accounting and Auditing all warrants paid.

SectionBody.Text: The Division of Treasury shall turn over to the Division of Accounting and Auditing all warrants drawn by the Chief Financial Officer or the Comptroller and paid by the Division of Treasury. The warrants shall be turned over as soon as the Division of Treasury shall have recorded such warrants and charged the same against the accounts upon which such warrants are drawn.
